SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Last-Minute Deals relative to Global Wings?
SRP.A: Last-Minute Deals is {below} Global Wings in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total flight bookings?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Global Wings}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total flight bookings?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Last-Minute Deals}.

EVJ.A: Global Wings reached approximately {349090.03} bookings/month in {1979}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Flight Bookings?
SC.A: The average total flight bookings is {292729.91} bookings/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Flight Bookings exceed 301560.32 bookings/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {350590.03} bookings/month in {1979}, {339332.01} bookings/month in {1957}, {310852.92} bookings/month in {1975}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Flight Bookings go below 281537.24 bookings/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {255000.68} bookings/month in {1971}, {271918.36} bookings/month in {1970}, {262399.40} bookings/month in {1962}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Flight Bookings fall between 276971.34 and 306126.22 bookings/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {292434.06} bookings/month in {1961}, {299356.63} bookings/month in {1974}, {299002.09} bookings/month in {1967}.

NC.Q: Was the total Flight Bookings in 1964 higher or lower than in 1970?
NC.A: The total flight bookings in 1964 was {lower} than in 1970.

NC.Q: Was the total Flight Bookings in 1962 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total flight bookings in 1962 was {higher} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1971, was the average total Flight Bookings higher or lower than between 1971 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total flight bookings between 1959 and 1971 was {lower} than between 1971 and 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Flight Bookings in 1975 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total flight bookings in 1975 was {lower} than in 1979.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Global Wings} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Last-Minute Deals, Global Wings}.
